entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Named HttpClient not sending certificate setup in handler #109050
  • .NET 8.0.10 vs 9.0.0 RC2 GC Server Performance Regression in Sep (CSV Parser) Benchmark (due to DATAS default) #109047
  • X509CertificateLoader fails to read cat files #109046
  • Inconsistent AssemblyVersion of Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions between .NET and .NET462 #109044
    Future
  • It is impossible to implement a span-like container where JIT would elide a custom bounds check #109043
  • On x86_64, JIT could reorder numeric operations to use the flag for subsequent conditional branch but does not do so #109042
  • Certificate validation routine fails with NotTimeValid when changing time zone on Linux while client app is still running #109039

Closed

  • ILVerify fails with non-actionable uncaught exception on specific (possibly corrupt?) DLL #109037
    Future
  • [trimmer] per-RID linked corlib assembly contains foreign platform intrinsics classes #93399
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.DateOnly should Add Calculate the difference between two DateOnly methods #109041
  • Microsoft.Owin.Security.OpenIdConnect not compatible with the latest Microsoft.IdentityModel.XX packages #109032
  • Disposal of System.Threading.RateLimiting.ConcurrencyLease #93808

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ConcurrentDictionary lookups from Unix socket event loop #109052
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 10.0.0
  • Update AVX-VNNI instruction perf characteristics #109038
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution

Merged

  • Define a function prototype for YieldProcessor #109028
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • use `nameof` for `CallerArgumentExpression` #109040
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update a few code paths to ensure the trimmer can do its job #106777
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics

Updated

  • JIT: Unroll more Equals/StartsWith/EndsWith on arm64 #109036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [API Implementation]: Expose CookieException constructors #109026
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add CoherentParentDependency on node packages #109022
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Aspire]: Dashboard does not show logs when using dotnet watch #44319
  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch IDE protocol doesn't update any process state #44318
  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch crashes after a few edits using Visual Studio #44317

Closed

  • Consider reporting agent log content through pipe back to dotnet-watch on each apply change #43323
  • Exception when changing files using dotnet watch with hot reload in Aspire #44260
    9.0.2xx
  • CTRL+R will restart entire process even though the option to restart mentions the single application that was changed #44261
    9.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Project graph restore #44322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix installing dependencies in vmr-build.yml #44314
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable signing on all except pgo #44306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire fixes #44313
    untriaged, Aspire
  • Continue printing out redirected process output after we detect browser launch URL. #44290
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Generate VSMSBuildExtension package in join point #44288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Ref returns/locals: Crash (& Debug.Asserts) in Inline Temp #8416
    Backlog
  • VB: inline a local updates code that should be left unchanged #18491
    Backlog
  • Suggest using of types in referenced Assembly #34642
    Backlog
  • Cleanup project only runs on one target framework #34419
    Backlog
  • Allow implementations of DocumentDiagnosticAnalyzer to return DiagnosticData #34360
    Backlog
  • Cancel button saves changes for Editing Naming Style options page #34215
    Backlog
  • Ensure workspace only returns document matches the content type of given text buffer #33439
    Backlog
  • Error List says that it has finished getting results, but analyzer's results haven't been populated #31850
    Backlog
  • Inline temporary variable messes up event registration for nested method #31300
    Backlog
  • Make `HostAnalysisScope` and its subtypes thread-safe #30458
    Backlog
  • Error List re-orders and scrolls after selecting one entry #30423
    Backlog
  • Public API design for IOptionWithGroup #30085
    Backlog
  • DeclareAsNullable fixer should trigger when assigning "maybe null" values to non-null variable #30110
    Backlog
  • Add tests to check tools|options pages against search keywords in VSPackage.resx file #29812
    Backlog
  • Avoid dependency on System.Collections.Immutable in AbstractConvertForEachToForCodeRefactoringProvider #29740

  • IDE analyzer/fixer test framework should always force enable analyzer rules by default #29615

  • Test devenv /build following vs-threading change #29284

  • Resolve inconsistent use of TestWorkspace.GetService<T> #29286
    Backlog
  • Intellisense partly assumes the wrong overload between Action<T> and Action<T1, T2> arguments #29493
    Backlog
  • VS doesn't automatically save modified additional document #29185

  • Editor Completion -- Properly support Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Completion.EnterKeyRule instead of having VB language check [working except After Fully Typed Word] #29220
    Backlog
  • Integration test failure: CSharpChangeSignatureDialog.VerifyReorderParameters/VerifyRemoveParameter "Failed to write to an IPC Port: The pipe is being closed." #29001
    Backlog
  • Typing fast with "Show completion list after a character is deleted" option [NEEDS BACKSPACE] #28796
    Backlog
  • Add Tests for product bug: VB Line Commit happening without the caret leaving the line #27988

  • Documentation missing for `IOption` #27358

  • we need test for EditorConfigDocumentOptionsProvider #26396

  • Enable and audit dispose rule suppressions in Roslyn.sln (CA2000 and CA2213) #25880
    Backlog
  • Ref returns/locals: Encapsulate Field - encapsulating fields used as ref returns causes attempt to illegally return ref property #8444
    Backlog
  • Change VB profile to enable "Warn if no user code on launch" by default #9383
    Backlog
  • testm Snippet doesn't automatically add a reference to Microsoft.VisualStudio.QualityTools.UnitTestFramework #12758

  • VB wrong codespit for a nested class that (so far) lacks End Class #3452

  • VB: When changing the type of a property, the type of it's setter should be updated automatically #3285

  • "Generate class" suggestion should prefer namespaces over classes for multiply-qualified names #4577

  • VB codespit for "Implement Interface" fails to add "Overloads" modifier where necessary #3238
    Backlog
  • Integration tests should correctly wait for workspace operations #33670
    Backlog
  • Nullability fixer for interface implementations #26833
    Backlog
  • Hint text for static string properties should show the static string #33218
    Backlog
  • In Quick Info, types in type parameter constraint clauses are not simplified #547
    Backlog
  • async completion: DebuggerTextView should not save topBuffer for the editor #31189
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense: double quote character should not be commit character #33636
    Backlog
  • workspace.WithDebuggerCompletionOptions should not be called in completion. Workspace should handle this internally #33337
    Backlog
  • Add a unit test for Async completion fails to scroll the caret into view #33861
    Backlog
  • Provide a unit test for "Restore original behavior of Shift+Enter during completion" #33863
    Backlog
  • provide a unit test for "Fix completion at the start of readonly documents" #33864
    Backlog
  • Completion should provide all in-scope type symbos #35060

  • Undo "restores" garbled code #34975
    Backlog

  • Intellisense misses internal LINQ variables available in Locals, Watch and Immediate windows #34780

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to debug on iOS 18 DEVICE, Xcode 16, lots of warnings, won't hit breakpoints #25395
  • didn't find curly braces #25394

Closed

  • DeploymentManagerCS is back - app can't start #25062
  • [MAUI] ListView rendering issues when binding the IsVisible property. #25221
  • In VS2022 17.11 Preview 5.0, when creating multi-project solution, the solution file gets duplicated and the progress is shown indefinitely #25213

PullRequests

Created

  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening - fix #25397
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [WIP] Avoid creating XamlTypeResolver for compiled bindings to avoid ILC warnings #25396
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Perf : ButtonContentTypeConverter now using InvariantCulture to parse… #25393
    community ✨
  • [Android] ClearButtonVisibility with margin fix #25392
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net9.0] Run device tests arm #25331
    do-not-merge
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] compile StaticResource w/ generics #25352
    area-xaml

Updated

  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [blazorwebview] align `SupportedOSPlatform` attribute with templates #25073
    area-blazor
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [X] don't expand types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area-xaml
  • Set title on maui-blazor template window #25387
    area-templates
  • Make Style nullable #25230
    community ✨
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • [gh actions] introduce "inclusive heat sensor" #25389
  • Merge sr9 into net9 ga #25265
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Re-enable tests #25268
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Moving last Xamarin.UITests to Appium #25366
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    community ✨
